venue.name: Odiorne Point State Park Phone: Odiorne:

item.description:
10:00 a.m launch from Ordione State Park Boat Ramp

Paddle to Wallis Sands Beach or Rye Harbor and return to Ordione.

Expected return time: 3:00 to 4:00 p.m.

Leisurely pace, stopping for rock garden play and possible surf session at Wallis Sands.

This paddle is restricted to sea kayaks with bulkheads 14 ft or longer. Wetsuit (farmer john) or drysuit REQUIRED.

Sunday Forecast: WSW winds 10 mph. Mostly sunny, chance of some morning rain. Temp: 75-80
item.how_to_find_us: State Boat Ramp - Next to Bridge
item.name: Ocean Paddle - Ordione Park to Wallis Sands
